content.description: Sit start way left of the boulder basin dyno and traverse right, eventually linking up with and executing the dyno.
content.location: Tulip Boulder. Is located at campsite 17

content.description:
A very simple problem with very simple moves.  As the name implies, Boulder Basin Dyno involves a long move from a juggy flake to the crystal lined lip.  Finish just at/past the knob at the higher part of the lip.

This is also the finish to The Tulip.

Since this problem is very definitely in a campsite, please be courteous to any campers staying there and either ask permission first before climbing, or come back another day.
content.protection:
Crashpad, spotters.

Surprisingly, despite the dyno being over a firepit, climbers tend to land just to the side of it.  That being said, it's probably best to have a spotter in case you backpedal into the firepit...
content.location: Found practically over the firepit of campsite #18.  Downclimb is around to the left, along a series of huecos.
